name: Surrogated Desires
description:
Warning: This game contains some slight suggestive content, as well as mentions of violence and blood.

At current stages, this is currently only a demo,  four more chapters are planned however.   With how progress is going, you can likely expect a full release within 4-6 months.  If not a full release, then you can at least expect another chapter within a month.

"Everyone who came to this manor is looking to get their desires fulfilled, one way or another."

Oletus Manor is truly an ideal place for dreams to come and die.  It's inhabitants forever trapped within its walls, forced over and over to partake in a game of hunting down each other.  

As a newly invited hunter, you had come here in hope to finally discover yourself.  Ever since you had become this . . . thing, you had no real clue on who you were.  What were you?  A murderer?  A monster?  A Deadman brought back?

The silence to these questions hurt, but the pain only furthered your resolve to truly solve them once and for all.  

And so forth, you headed into the Oletus Manor's alluring gates, unaware of the true terrors inside.

Despite it all, it seemed that there was some small hope left in this place for you . . .

Thank you to the lovely artist who helped me with Surrogated Desires!  Please check them and their lovely art out!
